example_sentence_italian: I voli per Roma sono pieni.
example_sentence_english: The flights to Rome are full.
I am used to long flights.

notes: contraction of a + il; idiomatic 'al volo' = quickly
example_sentence_italian: Ho comprato il biglietto al volo.

example_sentence_english: I receive messages from the canceled flights.

example_sentence_italian: Nei voli a lungo raggio servono coperte.
example_sentence_english: On long-haul flights they serve blankets.
I have information about the flight.
I read data about the canceled flights.
I leave with the ten o'clock flight.
